body.name: GLWIXY Fixed TV Wall Mount Bracket for Most 14~42 inch 4K LED LCD TVs & Monitor, Small Low Profile Wall Mount TV Bracket with Max VESA 200X200mm up to 66lbs, Ultra Slim TV Mount/Monitor Wall Mount
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 4 mins
features: 【Universal TV Compatibility】This wall mount is suitable for 14-42 inch televisions and monitor, with a maximum VESA compatibility of 200×200mm.You can customize long as your TV mount compatible.

【High-quality and Durable design】Our Fixed TV Wall Mount is designed with a sleek and modern look, adding a touch of sophistication to any living room or office. This TV holder is designed to support TV weight up to 66lbs.
【Space-saving Solution】With a minimalistic design, this wall mount sits only 0.9 inches from the wall, allowing you to maximize your living space and create a clean and clutter-free environment.

【3 Steps Quick Installation】Our TV mount comes with all the necessary hardware and accessories included, making installation quick and hassle-free. The smart design ensures a secure and stable mounting of your TV.

【Versatile usage】Whether it's in your living room, office, or even in outdoor spaces such as RVs or campers, our wall mount is a reliable and convenient choice. Its slim profile and industrial-grade metal construction make it suitable for various environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little Mount
reviews.reviewText: Great mount! Very easy to install and works perfectly! Very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, low profile mount
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice mount for what it is. It comes with very sturdy hardware and seems to be of a good quality. Be warned: it's of a very low profile so if you're mounting something that has any cables that poke out the back (rather than the side or bottom) then this plainly won't work. It doesn't have any articulation either, so you better get it perfectly level in one go. Measure twice / drill once. That said, it's a good and inexpensive option for a small-medium TV or monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very low profile; no tilt; easy install
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for a 27" monitor. My initial impression is this mount is very simple and intuitive to use. There is no tilt adjustment and you must remember to install the bottom locking screws to prevent accidentally lifting it off. This mount is incredibly slim, measuring only about 7/8" thick, which makes the monitor really flush to the wall. The weight limit is listed at 66lbs, which seems believable to me given how simple it is constructed. Due to the mount's narrow width, it could potentially fall between two studs if you are inflexible with mounting location. I am happy with this mount and think it's a tremendous value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Slim, low profile mount, great for small TVs or Monitors
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking to mount a smaller size TV and like it flush against the wall this is a simple option. The box claims it can hold 55lbs, but the Amazon listing claims 66lbs so there is some discrepancy on how much weight you can safely hang on this mount. Seeing that it only recommends using a 14-42 inch TV does eliminate some of the heavier options, so it shouldn’t be a problem either way.The bracket can accommodate a nice variety of VESA sizes from 75mm to 200mm. M4, M5, M6 screws and washers are included, but no spacers or other sizes. Check your TV manual to see what it requires as you might have to purchase them separately. They also include a mini bubble level to ensure you are mounting this straight and screws with anchors to hang it on the wall. You’ll need to mount this on concrete or wood attached to the studs in the wall. Never go straight into dry wall as it won’t support the weight of the TV.Since this is so slim and low profile once you have the bracket mounted on the wall, and the 2 brackets attached to your TV, you just have to hang the TV on the bracket similar to how you would hang a picture on a hook. Safety screws are supplied that screw the the bracket to the wall once the TV is hung. However getting those screws on are a difficult since there is little space to get your hand behind the screen to screw it in. The larger the screen the more difficult it will be.Aside from that it’s a pretty simple install that should fit a decent amount of TVs or monitors on the market. The price (under $10) at the time of writing this review is reasonable as well.
